entry.title: Trying a Plain Vanilla Post
entry.content:
First Post

So this is a first post, but it’s generated by writing directly. In the future I’ll have to look into

  • Generate it using R-markdown
  • Set up R-markdown templates that will prepend the above
  • Set up R-code to push it to the right directory when compiling
  • R-code to push it to git-hub

Questions on the set up

  • For blog posts: should they have their own git repo? I should probably create separate git repositories for new examples. Then I can link in the github repo.
  • How do I include shiny application. Assuming I find somewhere to host it, how do I make sure I can include it? Iframes?

Other questions and todo

  • Set up git repo on the NAS. Should be accessible and should be somehow linked to github and or bitbucket

Example R-code


library(data.table)
library(ggplot2)

dt <- data.frame(a = rnorm(200))

One day at a time

Svenski Blogpost

Over the past 24 hours I’ve been reflecting on my life & I’ve realized only one thing. I need a medieval battle axe.
